bildredberrygradient.description: angle must be set manually to 315 degs

sectionskonfigaro.description: Bild has a custom tool for styling specific blocks in its layouts. The tool allows for choosing any color.

heykispecialnavi.description: Font style used on Hey AI special navigation sliders.

bodybookparagraphspace2x.description: Use this for article text where paragraph spacings are large.

standardteaserheadline.description: Standard teasers typography changes more than other teasers. On desktop they have a kicker, a headline and a short text. On mobile devices the short text is eliminated and the headline gains weight at device widths 600px. Then at small mobile sizes the weight drops once again.

standardadteaserheadline.description: Standard teasers typography changes more than other teasers. On desktop they have a kicker, a headline and a short text. On mobile devices the short text is eliminated and the headline gains weight at device widths 600px. Then at small mobile sizes the weight drops once again.

menuitemlabel.description: Used on menu link lane items and on mobile side menu drawer.

menuitemutillabel.description: Use this tokenized font style for vertically laid out menu items with icons that are more important than the menu link lane items.

labelresponsivebold.description: This text style has variables for font family, weight and size. The size variable changes depending on the device mode (handy, tablet, desktop).

label1bold.description: Used on mobile site side menu drawer menu items list.

label2boldupper.description: Used on special navi component simiiar to link lane menu items.

largetitleuppercase.description: This text style does not have an underline. Across Bild's products this underline fills the horizontal space. This underline should be created on a container that wraps the title.
